## Public Member Attributes

### AddrSize {#a23af52a7e1bd7e192e0c9bb1073d114f}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>uint8&#95;t llvm::DWARFDebugArangeSet::Header::AddrSize</>}>
The size in bytes of an address on the target architecture.

For segmented addressing, this is the size of the offset portion of the address.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfdebugarangeset-h/#l00038">38</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfdebugarangeset-h">DWARFDebugArangeSet.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### CuOffset {#a195b9597d283908270943d7a23d3ce7f}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>uint64&#95;t llvm::DWARFDebugArangeSet::Header::CuOffset</>}>
The offset from the beginning of the .debug&#95;info section of the compilation unit entry referenced by the table.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfdebugarangeset-h/#l00033">33</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfdebugarangeset-h">DWARFDebugArangeSet.h</a>.

### Length {#a31f64e49c7ecc4dcb3bb82287e5b0b12}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>uint64&#95;t llvm::DWARFDebugArangeSet::Header::Length</>}>
The total length of the entries for that set, not including the length field itself.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfdebugarangeset-h/#l00028">28</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfdebugarangeset-h">DWARFDebugArangeSet.h</a>.

### SegSize {#adbb5cfb0b5740d9bd468210382016820}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>uint8&#95;t llvm::DWARFDebugArangeSet::Header::SegSize</>}>
The size in bytes of a segment descriptor on the target architecture.

If the target system uses a flat address space, this value is 0.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfdebugarangeset-h/#l00041">41</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfdebugarangeset-h">DWARFDebugArangeSet.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
